Single Cell Biology

Conference year: 2020

Total years: 1

Disciplines: Biology, Biophysics

Attendance cost: $2000-4000

Registration fee: $385-$1062

Carbon footprint: 450

Other carbon footprint: 90

Society name: The UK Wellcome Trust

Society members: Not Applicable

Attendees: 300

Venue: Wellcome Genome Campus, UK

Frequency: Annual

Sponsors: 10xGenomics(https://www.10xgenomics.com/), Takara(https://www.takarabio.com/), PArtek(https://www.partek.com/), sptlabtech(https://www.sptlabtech.com/), dolomitebio(https://www.dolomite-bio.com/), biotechne(https://www.bio-techne.com/), Cytena(https://www.cytena.com/home.html)

Virtual option: None

Digital archives: None

Program dissemination: Yes the meeting program was available online as a .pdf file.

Caregiver grant: None

Career development: None

ECR promotion: None

Travel awards: Yes (A limited number of registration bursaries are available for PhD students to attend this conference (up to 50percent of the standard registration fee) from Wellcome Genome Campus Scientific Conferences.)

Safety instructions: None

Gender balance: None
